note.p: German-born American physician and surgeon. Emigrated from Mansfelde, Germany, in 1862. Received his qualification from Rush Medical College, Chicago, 1872. Practised in Lincoln, Nebraska, 1875–8, and Ashland, Nebraska, from 1878. Lecturer on pathology and the practice of medicine, Omaha Medical College.
Ashland Historical Society, Historic homes in Ashland NE, www.ashlandhistoricalsociety.org (accessed 12 August 2014)
Directory of deceased American physicians, 1804–1929 (Ancestry.com, accessed 12 August 2014)
